name: 邹正宇
bio_zh: 我目前是西北工业大学自动化学院的二年级（2024年-至今）硕士研究生，师从张鼎文教授。目前，我也在地平线进行3D视觉基础模型的相关项目合作。我的研究兴趣包括3D场景重建与3D场景理解。
bio_en: I am currently a second-year master’s student (2024–present) at the School of Automation, Northwestern Polytechnical University, supervised by Prof. Dingwen Zhang. I am also collaborating with Horizon Robotics on research projects related to 3D vision foundation models. My research interests include 3D scene reconstruction and 3D scene understanding.
